tool.name: tool_1

param.name: ATTRIBUTES
param.dialogReference:
Parent Attributes

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] index

[1] attributes

[2] index and attributes

Default: 0

attributes inherited by parent lines layers

param.name: DISTANCES
param.dialogReference:
Distances to profile start point

Shapes, output

Distances > 0 if towards sea side (acretion) and < 0 if towards landside (erosion)

tool.summary: The Coastal Profile Crossings tool identifies the crossing points between coastal profiles along a reference coastline (from CliffMetrics Normal outputs) and any other coast lines and calculates the distance and coastline differences metrics.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
